title: Raja
description: I will surely be king" - The story takes place in ancient India, a country in turmoil where numerous nations are competing against each other. The two heroes, Kautilya, a young man with one eye and full of ambition, and Chandragupta, a leader of a band of thieves with overwhelming charisma and military prowess, meet on a full-moon night and take the first step toward "kingship" in their quest to unite India. On the night of the full moon, these two heroes meet and take the first step on the "royal road" to unify India - the story depicts the struggle of men with the "capacity of kings"! The curtain rises on this historical romance!
author: Innami Kouta
